channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #BREAKING Favourite Galopin Des Champs 赢得切尔滕纳姆金杯 #AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Favourite Galopin Des Champs wins back-to-back Cheltenham Gold Cups #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/0B5hRm3LVq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇺🇸🦈 头条新闻称佛罗里达州是世界上最有可能被鲨鱼咬伤的地方。他们说得没错，但被鲨鱼咬伤的情况极为罕见，科学家们希望更多的人知道这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇸🦈 Headlines have dubbed Florida the world's most likely place to be bitten by a shark. They're right, but shark bites are exceedingly rare, a fact scientists wish more people knew especially amid declining shark populations in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/iEARW93eLd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: #西方盟国将为乌克兰建立新的远程武器联盟：德国肖尔茨
item.description:
#BREAKING Western allies to establish new long-range weapons coalition for Ukraine: Germany's Scholz pic.twitter.com/FM1Dzefjow

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇯🇵 东京惊叹于早开的樱花日本首都的居民和游客在樱花季正式开始前一周醒来，就看到了这一壮观景象。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇯🇵 Tokyo marvels at early blooming cherry blossoms

Residents and visitors to the Japanese capital have woken up to the spectacle a week ahead of the sakura season's official start. pic.twitter.com/zTHmImXYUA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 当地官员周五表示，一艘船在土耳其海岸附近倾覆，包括七名儿童在内的 22 名移民溺水身亡，⬇️。
item.description:
Twenty-two migrants including seven children have drowned after a boat capsized off the Turkish coast, local officials said on Friday ⬇️ https://t.co/6B4dQz756F

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 瓜迪奥拉表示，凯文-德布劳内将缺席周六曼城对阵纽卡斯尔的 #FACup#四分之一决赛，比利时中场将在球队追逐三冠王的最后几周努力伤愈复出 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Pep Guardiola says Kevin De Bruyne will miss Manchester City's #FACup quarter-final against Newcastle on Saturday as the Belgium midfielder battles to return from injury for the final weeks of his side's treble chase ➡️ https://t.co/wCTaZ9KcT3 #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/SBWLCkzloF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇺🇸🦈 头条新闻称佛罗里达州是世界上最有可能被鲨鱼咬伤的地方。他们说得没错，但被鲨鱼咬伤的情况极为罕见--科学家们希望更多人知道这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下📹 @photolarte
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇸🦈 Headlines have dubbed Florida the world's most likely place to be bitten by a shark. They're right, but shark bites are exceedingly rare -- a fact scientists wish more people knew especially amid declining shark populations in need of conservation
📹 @photolarte pic.twitter.com/AP7x0a8iyj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇸🇳 塞内加尔反对派领导人在投票前获释的庆祝活动奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）和巴希尔-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）获释出狱，在该国总统选举前十天引发了欢庆场面。@MaxxGaye, @KlkCarl📷 @wesselsjohn1#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇸🇳 Celebrations as Senegal opposition leaders released before vote

Ousmane Sonko and Bassirou Diomaye Faye have been released from prison, sparking jubilant scenes ten days before the country's presidential election.

📹 @MaxxGaye, @KlkCarl
📷 @wesselsjohn1#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/9Zs8zTkjds

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 周五的抽签结果显示，利物浦将在 #欧洲联赛四分之一决赛中对阵意大利球队亚特兰大，安菲尔德队有可能在决赛中与哈维-阿隆索的拜耳勒沃库森队相遇 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Liverpool will play Italian side Atalanta in the #EuropaLeague quarter-finals after the teams were paired in Friday's draw, which left open the possibility of the Anfield side meeting Xabi Alonso's Bayer Leverkusen in the final ⬇️ https://t.co/voElbv5ljb #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯提议新的为期六周的加沙停战、以色列人质-巴勒斯坦囚犯交换：官员
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas proposes new six-week Gaza truce, Israeli hostage-Palestinian prisoner exchange: official pic.twitter.com/uw6x7zUaeU

item.title: 在废弃的纽约机场，一个与城市隔绝的移民营地。📸@CTriballeau #AFP
item.description:
At disused New York airport, a migrant camp isolated from the city.
📸@CTriballeau #AFP pic.twitter.com/gyUFxWkeCq

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 14, 2024

item.title: 视频：在拉各斯贾坎德区，数千名居民的家园被毁，这是当地政府为修建一条新高速公路而发起的大规模驱逐行动的一部分。
item.description:
VIDEO: Thousands of people living in Lagos' Jakande district are seeing their homes destroyed as part of a major eviction operation launched by local authorities in order to make way for a new highway. pic.twitter.com/HMlkn11LAx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔周五等待主要反对党人士奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）和巴希鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）在总统竞选活动中就位，此前他们从狱中获释引发了关键投票前十天的欢庆场面。
item.description:
Senegal waited Friday for key opposition figures Ousmane Sonko and Bassirou Diomaye Faye to take their place on the presidential campaign trail, after their release from prison sparked jubilant scenes 10 days before the key vote.https://t.co/hI4EhFaNIX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：头条新闻称佛罗里达州是世界上最有可能被鲨鱼咬伤的地方。他们说得没错，但被鲨鱼咬伤的情况极为罕见--科学家们希望更多人知道这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟需保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: Headlines have dubbed Florida the world's most likely place to be bitten by a shark. They're right, but shark bites are exceedingly rare -- a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/iYUuum0NWL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 前往巴黎参加奥运会的新手父母们发现，除非婴儿有自己的座位，否则他们将被拒绝进入场馆，因此他们呼吁改变购票规则。
item.description:
New parents heading to the Paris Olympics are calling for a ticketing rule change after discovering that their infants will be refused entry to venues unless they have their own seats.https://t.co/tcspBrJU9g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 香港天主教会周五表示，根据香港即将实施的国家安全法，信徒向神父的忏悔将继续保密。
item.description:
The Catholic Church in Hong Kong said Friday that confessions by devotees to priests would remain confidential under the city's upcoming national security law.https://t.co/jNGncPGfws

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯和乌克兰周五表示，由于两国相互发射了大量炮弹和无人机，一夜之间的空袭造成了平民死亡。
item.description:
Russia and Ukraine said Friday that overnight aerial attacks had killed civilians, as both countries launched a wave of artillery and drone fire at each other.https://t.co/kyQdvgfT4k pic.twitter.com/95gfxEoIdN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：对于冲突和政变频发的缅甸的许多农民来说，在全国各地的社会和经济动荡中，种植罂粟已成为他们维持生计的唯一途径。
item.description:
VIDEO: For many farmers in conflict and coup-riven Myanmar, poppy farming has become their only way of making ends meet amid the social and economic turmoil across the country. pic.twitter.com/9i1QEL6UBe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 本周图片（3 月 09-15 日）#AFP
item.description:
PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 09-15)#AFP https://t.co/Av3sOO85Cj pic.twitter.com/XvRzyitNOf

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：在巴米扬省的一个斜坡边缘，选手们轮流从山坡上滑下，互相加油打气，团结一致，共同维护阿富汗滑雪运动的生命力。
item.description:
VIDEO: From the edge of a slope in the province of Bamiyan, rivals cheer each other on as they take turns to race down the mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan. pic.twitter.com/bkLgrNVXh8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 周五，俄罗斯人开始在为期三天的总统选举中投票，在肆虐的乌克兰冲突进一步蔓延到俄罗斯境内之际，老牌领导人弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）将再次获得六年任期。
item.description:
Russians started voting on Friday in a three-day presidential election that is set to hand veteran leader Vladimir Putin another six-year term as the raging conflict in Ukraine spreads further into Russian territory.https://t.co/4NmnbcH53h

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本最大的工会周五表示，其初步数据创下了自 1991 年以来的最高工资涨幅，这激起了人们对日本央行最终将放弃其异常超宽松货币政策的猜测。
item.description:
Japan's largest trade union said Friday it had secured the highest wage hikes since 1991 in preliminary data that stokes speculation the central bank will finally shift away from its outlier ultra-loose monetary policy.https://t.co/Wehwhs0kZR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：美国众议院通过一项法案，迫使视频共享应用程序 TikTok 与其中国母公司断绝关系，否则将在美国被禁用，此后中美之间爆发了一场争论。
item.description:
VIDEO: A spat has erupted between the US and China after the American House of Representatives passed a bill forcing the video-sharing app TikTok to sever ties with its Chinese parent company or be banned in the United States. pic.twitter.com/jbUaZhlqT6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日本两大汽车公司日产和本田周五表示，它们正在探索建立电动汽车战略合作伙伴关系，以应对汽车行业 "百年一遇 "的大变革。
item.description:
Japanese arch-rivals Nissan and Honda said Friday they were exploring a strategic partnership in electric vehicles to face up to a "once-in-a-century" upheaval in the car industry.https://t.co/HBKSASW0Y5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：在阿富汗，一半人口生活在贫困之中，失业男子在东北部山区靠采金过着危险的生活。
item.description:
VIDEO: In Afghanistan, where half the population live in poverty, unemployed men try their luck carving out a dangerous living as gold miners in the northeastern mountains. pic.twitter.com/to854w3YcW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 多年来，欧盟在波斯尼亚加入欧盟的问题上时冷时热，但随着加入欧盟的谈判最终迫在眉睫，波斯尼亚的耐心可能会得到回报。
item.description:
Bosnia has trodden a long and winding road to eventual European Union membership after years of seeing the bloc blow hot and cold on the issue, but its patience could be rewarded as accession talks finally loom.https://t.co/towZntUNKT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频每年，圣地亚哥-夏利钦特拉的当地人都会用歌声、舞蹈和礼物来庆祝 "唐-戈约 "的 "生日"，他们亲切地称呼波波卡特佩特火山为 "唐-戈约"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Each year, locals from Santiago Xalitzintla celebrate the "birthday" of "Don Goyo", as they affectionately call the Popocatepetl volcano, with songs, dance and gifts. pic.twitter.com/p1f9nMZDQC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 视频：雷宾-皮什蒂万（Rebin Pishtiwan）蜷缩在一辆面包车的后座上，仔细地扫描着一页又一页泛黄的纸张，这是库尔德斯坦艺术与文化中心（KCAC）发起的一个项目的一部分，该项目旨在将有可能永远消失的库尔德历史文献数字化。
item.description:
VIDEO: Huddled in the back of a van, Rebin Pishtiwan carefully scans one yellowed page after another, as part of a project launched by the Kurdistan Centre for Art and Culture (KCAC) to digitise historic Kurdish texts at risk of disappearing forever. pic.twitter.com/GU84WfN3pC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 香港天主教会称，根据新的国家安全法，忏悔将继续保密。新法规定，任何人如果知道有人将犯下叛国罪，但没有向警方报告，将被判处监禁。
item.description:
Catholic Church in Hong Kong says confessions will remain secret under new national security law.

The new law proposes jail terms for any person who knows that someone will commit treason but fails to report it to the policehttps://t.co/lpvFvfFiJF pic.twitter.com/G0WV3iw48w

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 艺术与技术相结合"，纽约最新的博物馆承诺以 "身临其境的感官 "体验重塑艺术形式。美世实验室艺术与技术博物馆展出了画家、雕塑家、声光设计师罗伊-纳克姆的作品。
item.description:
'Art meets technology'

New York's latest museum is promising to reinvent the format with an "immersive and sensory" experience. The Mercer Labs Museum of Art and Technology features works by Roy Nachum, a painter, sculptor and sound and light designerhttps://t.co/gCwmPD4YoR pic.twitter.com/lS8UzN7PVX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 15, 2024
